author: jih2nn
content: Could you remind me when you succeed in (or very close to) the interop? I'd like to keep the list with well-maintained ones :)

content: I have it working with light house right now. And other CL clients had no issues but they were missing a one thing or another, so they werenâ€™t

author: jih2nn
content:
Reth <> Lighthouse doesn't work. Other client combination as well. Of Lighthouse logs, this line seems important.

```
[cl-1-lighthouse-reth] Aug 14 09:51:41.004 WARN  Not ready for Eip7805Readiness                hint: "try updating the execution endpoint", info: Execution endpoint does not support eip7805 methods: Required Methods Unsupported: engine_getInclusionListV1 
```

author: sibkatya
content:
Added tiny fix for Lodestar, so, Geth + this Lodestar image  `sibkatya/lodestar:focil
` should work

author: sibkatya
content: you can try rebuild an image from the focil branch

author: jih2nn
content: It works well, thanks! FYI, devops team automatically updates docker image so you could use `ethpandaops/lodestar:focil`.

author: jih2nn
content: Also you might want to add `--platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64` flag when building the docker image to support multiplatform :)

author: jih2nn
content: The [engine API spec](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/609) has been updated and here is the [change log](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/609#issuecomment-3188627574).

author: pellekrab
content: Weird, could you send me your kurtosis config? or are you using a different lighthouse branch then the one in the FOCIL Implers Hackmd?

author: sibkatya
content: For me LH also didn't work a couple of weeks ago

author: jih2nn
content:
I used this one (Reth image is built based on your branch):
```
participants:
  - el_type: reth
    el_image: reth-focil:latest
    cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: jihoonsg/lighthouse-focil:92c22ed
network_params:
  genesis_delay: 20
  electra_fork_epoch: 0
  eip7805_fork_epoch: 1
  seconds_per_slot: 6
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 256
snooper_enabled: true
additional_services:
  - dora
  - tx_fuzz
  - spamoor
port_publisher:
  additional_services:
    enabled: true
    public_port_start: 65500
spamoor_params:
  spammers:
    - scenario: eoatx
      config:
        throughput: 100
    - scenario: uniswap-swaps
      config:
        throughput: 100
    - scenario: blob-combined
      config:
        throughput: 5
```

author: pellekrab
content: Ok yeah I was using https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/tree/electra-focil. Also what is the reason for removing the vc_client?

author: jih2nn
content: You don't need vc_client for Lighthouse. Prysm requires it because of its design

this is the correct lighthouse branch: https://github.com/eserilev/lighthouse/tree/electra-focil-branch

I havent touched it in a few months, but last I checked it was able to interop with the other cl clients
